titleStmt.title: An account of Mr. Edward Sclater's return to the communion of the Church of England and of the recantation he made at the Church of St. Mary Savoy, the fifth of May, 1689. Dr. Burnet, Bishop of Sarum, preaching the sermon there that forenoon. / By Anthony Horneck D.D.
titleStmt.author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
